Headline: #55 Garfield Temporary Eastbound Reroute near 55th/Western
ShortDescription: Eastbound 55 Garfield buses are temporarily rerouted via Western, 59th, Damen, and 55th due to, street blockage near 55th/Western.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Eastbound #55 Garfield buses are temporarily rerouted via Western, 59th, Damen, and 55th due to, street blockage near 55th/Western.

Westbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #28 Stony Island Temporary Southbound Reroute near Stony Island/81st
ShortDescription: Southbound 28 Stony Island buses are temporarily rerouted via Stony Island, Anthony, 83rd, and Stony Island, due to street blockage near Stony Island/81st.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Southbound #28 Stony Island buses are temporarily rerouted via Stony Island, Anthony, 83rd, and Stony Island, due to street blockage near Stony Island/81st.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
